text_block_list.text: After school. I came to pick up Daiwa Scarlet for training, when…

text_block_list.name: Teacher A
text_block_list.text: I'm really sorry for asking you to do so many things since early this morning. But you've really been a huge help, so thank you.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Oh no, it's no big deal. Please tell me whenever you need any help!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Now if you'll excuse me, I'll be going now!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: …Phew. People have been asking me favors all day… I've got to start getting ready for training-

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Hya!? T-Trainer!? Don't scare me like that!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: …Sheesh, you went out your way to pick me up? I was about to start heading there anyway. Mind your own business.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: …Also, I'm not tired at all. You're just imagining things.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Doing favors for people is part of my daily routine so this is nothing to me.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Yeah, yeah. I get it. Just so you know, I'm an honor student.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: More relied on than anyone else, and never failing anyone's expectations. The best horse girl in terms of lifestyle, academics and racing: Number one.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: That's what it means to be Daiwa Scarlet! I can handle something as small as this myself.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Don't worry about my personal life and just focus on my training.
choice_data_list: I told you I'd support you, though?
I told you I'd support you, though?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: That was all the way back when you scouted me…! Well… I did say I was going to be number one, but…!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: But that… doesn't mean you have to concern yourself with something like this…

text_block_list.name: Classmate A
text_block_list.text: Daiwa Scarlet-san! Can I ask you something?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Ah… Y-yes? What is it?

text_block_list.name: Classmate A
text_block_list.text: Actually, we need to get some appliances in place for tomorrow's home-ec class… Sorry to bother you, but… I was wondering if you could help us with that.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Yeah, I don't mind! I'll be right there, so could you start without me?

text_block_list.name: Classmate A
text_block_list.text: Wow, thanks! I knew I should have asked you! See you at the storage room, then!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Trainer, sorry but you'll have to go without me.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: No, I don't need any help… It's got nothing to do with you, but… I just don't want to rely on anyone else for something I got asked to do.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: You should just focus on getting stuff ready for training! I'll be there soon, okay?
I got driven out by her…
30 minutes later.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Phew… That sure took longer than I thought it would. Anyway, let's get started.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: …Hey, what's with you? You've been staring… are you angry at me? Well, sorry for making you wait.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: I-I'm not! I can't stay number one if I can't even do something like that!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: The same goes for my training. I'll just have to make up for how long I've been late-
choice_data_list: You've got to rely on me more!
You've got to rely on me more!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: What the heck… Don't make it sound like I'm the one being stubborn!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Well… You're my trainer after all… If that's the case, then…

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Ughh, jeez! This is pissing me off! Let's just get this thing started already!
Daiwa Scarlet, the horse girl obsessed with being number one. It looks like there's still a long way to go before she learns to trust and depend on me.
